short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You Donate While You Shop - Shop at participating online merchants and a portion of the transaction goes directly to ZBT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ZBT Dollars browser reminder allows members of the ZBTDollars.com powered by ShareRewards to be easily reminded when they visit an online merchant that is also part of the ZBT Dollars Program.
